#summary MconfMobile video integration.

= Introduction =
In this chapter it will be explained how the video support was integrated to MconfMobile. Firstly, some alternatives that didn't work will be presented [http://code.google.com/p/mconf/wiki/MconfMobileVideoAlternatives here]. Secondly, the implementation is described [http://code.google.com/p/mconf/wiki/MconfMobileVideoImplementation here].
